full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title and Details

* **Title (English)**: Ore Preparation Service
* **Title (French)**: Service de préparation du minerai
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01004958
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Tender Number**: NRCan- 5000067916
* **Publication Date**: August 22, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 3, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

#### Brief Description of the Project

The Natural Resources Canada is soliciting proposals for the provision of ore preparation services for metallurgical testing.

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **NOTICE TYPE**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Important Requirements

* **GSIN Codes**: B200A, B200B (Rock Core Drilling and Sampling, Geological Studies)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada
	+ Address: 580 Booth St, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E4, Canada
	+ Contact Person: Brenda Harlow, [Brenda.Harlow@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:Brenda.Harlow@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)

#### Additional Information

* **Attachments**: Four documents are available for download, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and Questions and Answers (QA-QR).
* **Notice URL**: N/A
* **Contact Fax**: N/A
* **Contact Phone**: N/A

This is a government tender announcement for the provision of ore preparation services. The Natural Resources Canada is looking for a provider who can prepare ore samples for metallurgical testing. The tender is open to all qualified providers who can demonstrate their ability to perform the required services. The tender closing date is October 3, 2022. The successful provider will be selected based on a competitive bidding process.
